name: Mystery from the Attic
description:
Global Game Jam 2019 project from team railplai.

-------

Theme : What does home mean to you ?

Plot : You play as Oggy, a little children who is exploring his house during the night time.

It's a little puzzle/reflexion game with different mechanics.

-------

How to play ? 

Directionals arrow or ZQSD/QWERTY keyboards
